sections.title: Critical
sections.content: Dial emergency number immediately and maintain communication.

sections.title: Your safety is the priority
sections.content: Follow instructions that protect your teachers and school officials.

sections.title: Stealth
sections.content: All steps should be performed quickly and quietly.

sections.title: Tactical medical care
sections.content: Requires specialized training and coordination with medical teams.

sections.title: Mass casualty events
sections.content: Ensure coordinated response and systematic triage protocols.

sections.title: Reunification
sections.content: It is a both a logistical and emotional process requiring patience and coordination.

steps.title: Alert
steps.subtitle: Recognize and accept the threat. Immediately initiate lockdown procedures. Notify all staff and students through communication systems.

steps.title: Lockdown
steps.subtitle: Secure all areas immediately. Lock all doors and windows. Direct everyone to move away from sight lines.

steps.title: Inform
steps.subtitle: Provide ongoing updates to staff, students, and emergency services. Maintain communication with incident command.

steps.title: Counter
steps.subtitle: If shooter enters your space, take action to disrupt or incapacitate as last resort. Work together as a team.

steps.title: Evacuate
steps.subtitle: Once it is safe, evacuate the premises following predetermined routes.

steps.title: Reunification
steps.subtitle: After threat is neutralized, facilitate safe reunification of students with families.

steps.title: Stay Calm and Assess
steps.subtitle: Take deep breaths. Listen carefully. Assess surroundings for threats and exits.

steps.title: Follow Teacher Instructions
steps.subtitle: Listen and follow instructions without question. Help younger students if needed.

steps.title: Secure Hiding Position
steps.subtitle: Move away from doors and windows. Stay low. Hide behind solid objects.

steps.title: Silence All Devices
steps.subtitle: Turn phones to silent. Avoid using devices unless emergency.

steps.title: Prepare to Move if Needed
steps.subtitle: Be ready to evacuate if instructed. Follow escape routes.

steps.title: Protect and Support Others
steps.subtitle: Help calm others. Assist in keeping group safe.

steps.title: Assess Scene Safety
steps.subtitle: Confirm scene secure. Identify hot zones. Establish medical position with cover.

steps.title: Rapid Triage Assessment
steps.subtitle: Use START triage. Prioritize life-threatening injuries.

steps.title: Provide Tactical Medical Care
steps.subtitle: Control hemorrhage. Secure airway. Treat pneumothorax.

steps.title: Coordinate Medical Evacuation
steps.subtitle: Communicate with incident command. Request resources.

steps.title: Monitor and Reassess
steps.subtitle: Monitor vital signs. Reassess triage categories.

steps.title: Prepare for Transport
steps.subtitle: Ready patients for evacuation to hospitals.

steps.title: Establish Triage Area
steps.subtitle: Set up triage zones. Implement START protocol.

steps.title: Request Additional Resources
steps.subtitle: Call for multiple ambulances. Request trauma resources.

steps.title: Treat Immediate Priorities
steps.subtitle: Focus on life-threatening bleeding and airway management.

steps.title: Organize Patient Transport
steps.subtitle: Match patients with appropriate facilities.

steps.title: Document All Actions
steps.subtitle: Maintain patient tracking records.

steps.title: Assessment
steps.subtitle: Reassess patient conditions. Adjust treatment priorities.

steps.title: Lock the Door
steps.subtitle: Use door stops or wedges. If door doesn't lock, hold it shut.

steps.title: Move Heavy Furniture
steps.subtitle: Push desks, chairs, bookcases against door.

steps.title: Reinforce the Barricade
steps.subtitle: Stack chairs. Use rope or belts to secure furniture.

steps.title: Block Windows and Sight Lines
steps.subtitle: Cover windows with anything available.

steps.title: Create Hiding Areas
steps.subtitle: Find areas not visible from outside. Stay low and quiet.

steps.title: Prepare Final Defense
steps.subtitle: Gather defensive items. Use only as a last resort.

steps.title: Assess Evacuation Routes
steps.subtitle: Identify primary and secondary routes. Ensure safe corridors.

steps.title: Alert and Direct Evacuation
steps.subtitle: Use alarms or PA system. Guide people away from danger.

steps.title: Coordinate Group Movement
steps.subtitle: Assist individuals with disabilities. Maintain orderly evacuation.

steps.title: Secure Assembly Areas
steps.subtitle: Ensure adequate space and security for evacuees.

steps.title: Account for All Personnel
steps.subtitle: Report missing individuals to command.

steps.title: Maintain Security and Control
steps.subtitle: Prevent unauthorized entry. Coordinate with responders.

steps.title: Establish Incident Command
steps.subtitle: Set up command post. Designate commander.

steps.title: Assign Key Roles
steps.subtitle: Assign operations, logistics, planning, finance sections.

steps.title: Coordinate Resources
steps.subtitle: Deploy teams. Coordinate medical response.

steps.title: Manage Information Flow
steps.subtitle: Collect intelligence. Maintain situational awareness.

steps.title: Ensure Responder Safety
steps.subtitle: Monitor responder locations. Implement accountability.

steps.title: Document and Transition
steps.subtitle: Maintain incident log. Prepare transition to recovery phase.

steps.title: Ensure Immediate Safety
steps.subtitle: Verify all-clear. Check for injuries. Ensure area safe.

steps.title: Provide Medical Aid
steps.subtitle: Assess injuries. Treat or call for medical support.

steps.title: Account for Everyone
steps.subtitle: Conduct headcount. Report missing persons.

steps.title: Preserve Evidence
steps.subtitle: Do not disturb scene. Document observations.

steps.title: Coordinate with Authorities
steps.subtitle: Follow investigation protocols. Assist reunification.

steps.title: Support Long-term Recovery
steps.subtitle: Provide counseling. Participate in after-action review.

steps.title: Establish Reunification Site
steps.subtitle: Set up secure location away from incident scene.

steps.title: Register Families
steps.subtitle: Verify identities. Track arrival times and relationships.

steps.title: Communicate Information
steps.subtitle: Share information appropriately. Coordinate updates.

steps.title: Coordinate Reunification Process
steps.subtitle: Match students with verified family members.

steps.title: Provide Security and Support
steps.subtitle: Provide crowd control and crisis counseling.

steps.title: Follow-up Support Services
steps.subtitle: Provide ongoing resources and schedule counseling.
